faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to frequently asked questions about our professional AI headshot generator.

items.title: How does the AI generator work?
items.description: Getting professional business photos with our AI is simple. First, you upload some of your selfies. Then our AI gets to work and generates a variety of business photos in different styles. You can then browse your new business photos and download your favorites. It's that easy!

items.title: What happens to my photos after I upload them?
items.description: Your privacy is our top priority. We use your uploaded photos exclusively to generate your business photos. Your photos are never used for other purposes and are automatically deleted from our servers within 30 days.

items.title: Who owns the AI headshots?
items.description: You do. You have full ownership and commercial rights to your AI-generated business photos. Use them for your LinkedIn profile, company website, or any other professional purpose.

items.title: What if I'm not satisfied with my business photos?
items.description: We stand behind our service with a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not satisfied with your business photos, we offer a free redo with new settings. Our goal is to ensure you get a business photo you love.

items.title: How long does it take to get my AI headshots?
items.description: You'll receive your business photos the same day. The process usually takes about 2 hours. We focus on delivering high-quality, realistic business photos, so we take the time to get it right.

items.title: Can I use my AI business photos on LinkedIn?
items.description: Absolutely. Our business photos are perfect for LinkedIn. Many of our customers use their new business photos to enhance their professional profiles and make a great first impression.
